concept.title: ABOUT THE GAME
concept.intro: Active Games is an innovative interactive gaming complex based on teamwork, movement, and strategic thinking.
description: The experience is designed for groups of up to 6 players and lasts 60 minutes of non-stop action.
Upon arrival, each player receives a smart bracelet and registers with their name. The bracelet identifies you throughout the game – every point, achievement, and challenge is saved on it.
Before entering each room, the group scans the bracelet, and the system automatically identifies participants and activates the selected game.

The complex includes 8 different rooms, each with its own world, concept, and unique challenges. Each room offers multiple games with varying difficulty levels, so every group can choose the challenges that suit them.
You can play in competitive mode or team mode – compete against each other or cooperate with friends and partners, choosing in each game whether to play as rivals or as one team.
There's no fixed route and no required order – you choose where to enter, when to switch rooms, and which strategy will lead you to maximum points.
Active Games is a dynamic, immersive, and adrenaline-filled experience where cooperation, speed, and sharp thinking are the keys to victory.

games.title: OUR GAMES
games.subtitle: Each game offers a unique experience combining fun, challenge, and physical engagement. Reflexes, coordination, or cooperation: choose your style and dive into the action.

grid.name: Grid
grid.description: A revolutionary interactive flooring system with built-in RGB LED lights and sensors. Designed for all ages, it creates a dynamic and immersive experience.
grid.popup_description: The Active Games Grid immerses players in a captivating challenge of logic and reasoning on an interactive board. This dynamic game tests your analytical skills and strategy to complete the grid and achieve the objectives.

arena.name: Arena
arena.description: The ultimate dodgeball LED target wall game. Test speed, accuracy & memory with real-time scoring, tournaments & team challenges.
arena.popup_description: An interactive LED hexagon target wall where players use dodgeballs to hit glowing targets. Each match combines memory, agility, and speed. Hit the right colors and avoid the red zones to maximize your score.

push.name: Push
push.description: In this room, the walls are filled with buttons that can change colors. Various game modes test color recognition and memory abilities.
push.popup_description: Push is an observation and strategy challenge game. Surrounded by multi-colored button walls, players need to quickly identify patterns and use strategy, memory, and collaboration to press the right buttons within the time limit.

basketball.name: Hoops Basketball
basketball.description: An interactive basketball fitness game that combines fun, exercise, and technology—perfect for entertainment centers.
basketball.popup_description: A fully interactive fitness experience that combines the excitement of sports, the challenge of competition, and the innovation of modern technology. Every shot is recorded in real time.

climbing.name: Climbing
climbing.description: An interactive LED wall designed to test your agility, strategy, and team fun. This attraction combines physical movement with quick thinking.
climbing.popup_description: An interactive LED climbing wall game that simulates the thrill of cliff climbing. Players must step carefully along a narrow edge, grabbing green safe lights to move forward.

hide.name: Digital Hide Room
hide.description: In this room, sensor eyes track your every movement. Use strategic pillars for cover, complete light sequences, and work with your team to win.
hide.popup_description: A thrilling blend of stealth, strategy, and teamwork. Powered by advanced motion-sensing technology, the game challenges players to outsmart glowing « eyes » while completing interactive light sequences.

flash.name: Flash
flash.description: Two or more players must cooperate. Press the circular light before the randomly decreasing current reaches the target. The higher the level, the faster the current speed.
flash.popup_description: Flash is a game of quick reaction challenges. Light tubes cover the walls and a flash of electricity falls from the ceiling – you need to react quickly to intercept each flash before it reaches the end.

laser.name: Laser
laser.description: A thrilling escape room experience where players dodge laser beams by running, jumping, crawling, and rolling. Multiple game modes available.
laser.popup_description: Creates a real-life action challenge where players must dodge, crawl, and weave through an array of laser beams. This exciting maze tests your reflexes, agility, and strategy.
